actions.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of two Members on the part of the House to join with a committee of the Senate to notify the President that a quorum of each House has been assembled and that Congress is ready to receive any communication that he may be pleased to make.

summary.text: Notifies the President that a quorum of each House of Congress has assembled.

titles.title: Authorizing the Speaker to appoint a committee of two Members on the part of the House to join with a committee of the Senate to notify the President that a quorum of each House has been assembled and that Congress is ready to receive any communication that he may be pleased to make.
